snippet.title: Kaizo Mario Galaxy Release Trailer (Legacy Edition)
snippet.description:
Kaizo Mario Galaxy is a full game (120 star) hack that is centered around making Super Mario Galaxy more challenging, and more interesting!

This is the Legacy Edition of Kaizo Mario Galaxy originally released in 2018!
As of August 2023, a new update has been released under the name Kaizo Mario Galaxy Rebalanced. I recommend that version for new players! More details and a download link can be found here:
https://youtu.be/34l_jIGSNgU

Thank you to Collin Hughes for putting this trailer together for me: https://www.youtube.com/c/CollinHughes

Buoy Base Remix by Video Game Remixes (VGR):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=55BR7F4JcFQ

DOWNLOAD:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/soqgal0euif25bt/KaizoMarioGalaxyLegacyEdition.zip/file
